name: XMLDocument.ContentKind
desc: Type used to define the kind of document content.

items.name: case html
items.desc:
Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as
.

items.name: case text
items.desc: Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes.

items.name: case xml
items.desc: The default type of document content type, which is XML.
